text: "Who Do You Think You Are" is a 1997 song from Spice Girls. The song's lyrics are about superstar life and how anyone can get trapped in the world of fame. The song has a disco-style beat like music of the late 1970s. The song was a commercial success. The voice of singer Melanie Chisholm was liked by pop music critics. It became their fourth number one song in Europe and the United Kingdom. Category:1997 songs Category:Spice Girls songs
title: Who Do You Think You Are
